text: UMûsâ wakhetha amadoda angamashumi asixhenxe (angawona alungileyo) kubantu bakubo. Ewakhethela ixesha leThu elityunjiweyo nendawo yokuhlangana, bathi bakuhlaselwa yinyikima evuthuzayo, (uMûsâ) wathi: “O Nkosi yam, ukuba Ubuthandile ngowusitshabalalisile ndawonye nam kwangaphambili; Uza kusitshabalalisa na ngenxa yezenzo zabazizidenge phakathi kwethu? Ukuba (oku) kulucikido Olahlekisa ngalo lowo Uthande ukumlahlekisa Ugcine Othande ukumgcina ekwisiKhokelo, Wena UnguMkhuseli wethu, Sixolele thina, Ube nenceba kuthi: kuba Wena UnguMxoleli Ongaphezulu kunabo baxolelayo.”
